mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paid_tbl (paid_num, novel_num, paid_snum, paid_title, paid_content, paid_price) values (paid_num.nextval, #{novel_num},#{paid_snum},#{paid_title},#{paid_content},#{paid_price})
mapper.select: SELECT n.novel_num,n.novel_title,n.novel_writer, p.paid_snum, p.paid_title, p.paid_rdate, p.paid_mdate FROM paid_tbl p INNER JOIN novel_tbl n ON p.novel_num = n.novel_num where n.novel_num =#{novelNum}
